name: First Person Crossy Road
description:
Dodge cars, trains and hop across logs in this first person view take of the classic mobile game, Crossy Road. Watch out for the giant eagle behind you...

It's much scarier when you can see a car coming straight for you...

MAY NOT PEFORM VERY WELL, NOT MUCH OPTIMISATION WAS DONE

Use WASD to move around, and mouse to look around

Video coming next week
